title: Beauty Report with Amy Morrison 10.19.2017 - 08 PM
description:
Amy is sitting down and talking with Ouidad, Lancôme, and more! Amy shares her latest beauty tips and trends. From hair and makeup to skincare and fragrance, it's new every week. 

Watch every Thursday at 7 pm ET. *Prices shown on the previously recorded video may not represent the current price. Visit http://www.hsn.com to view the current selling price. Shop Beauty Report at HSN!
